website_summaries.verdict: Never worry about your spoon falling into your soup again with these well-designed notch and hook melamine soup spoons.
pros: The notch and hook design allows you to safely rest your spoon on the side of your bowl
Orange and black design is bold and eye-catching
With a slightly longer handle than most Asian style spoons, these are comfortable to hold
The deep bowl of the spoon holds a lot of soup and reduces spilling
cons: Be sure to always remove spoon when reheating soup

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking, eating Pho soup is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love how these spoons feel in my hands and they are just really nice. Eating Pho, is a pleasure with these spoons. These are better quality than what they use at the majority of restaurants. These are really amazing when you are serving soups. These are larger than traditional American silverware, because they are used by putting the spoon against your mouth, and then tip the contents inside your mouth, you don’t use these like traditional American spoons. So if you are not familiar with this way of eating soup, you might not like these. Used correctly, they are amazing and functional.
customer_reviews.author: RetroRich

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easily broken
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken. It’s quickly apparent, the second you hold one, that these aren’t restaurant-level quality. They feel lighter and less substantial than what you’re used to using when you eat out. Apparently they break pretty easily, too.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a girl who loves soups and stews.
customer_reviews.text: Don't you hate it when you have a bowl that requires two hands to carry, and so you put the spoon in the bowl and it is gone by the time you get to the table? These have two ways NOT to sink into your soup! First is the side carry, then there is the curved ends... I LOVE THESE!!! My only critique is that the square corners make it awkward to get everything off the spoon... other than that they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: E. Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are great and made of thick solid plastic. I have never owned Melamine items, so I was worried the quality might be, not so great. But these are beautiful! And there are several items that match the color on Amazon for a full Japanese set at a cheap price. The spoons are long enough that I have 32 oz melamine bowls and they don't fall in. Even bigger or deeper ramen bowls would make the spoon hook to the side, staying clean for use in your soup thanks to the handy design. They also work as chopstick holders, which is great since I have stainless steal circular ones that roll easily.
customer_reviews.author: T. L. Canary

customer_reviews.title: Ours were more orange than red.
customer_reviews.text: I saw this brilliant design in a restaurant and had to have some. Out of 5 stars, they deserve 6 for design. :-) The only downside is that the color we received was not bright red as shown in the advertisement, but more of a dark brick-reddish-orange. Someone actually asked about this in the questions section, and all the responses affirmed red. So I guess maybe there are different colors for different factory batches, with most folks getting red, but others like us getting dark orange.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Richard G Carter

customer_reviews.title: Finally a solution to my large soup bowl problem!
customer_reviews.text: I have large white bowls that I use for soups/ramen and the problem I have is that my existing soup spoons would fall into the broth. I needed the type of soup spoons that I see at ramen/pho restaurants but couldn't find soup spoons with hooks at all the local asian grocery stores..voila! Found 6 spoons here for cheap. Thanks again amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Sana Benigno

customer_reviews.title: Broken Products
customer_reviews.text: Two of the six spoons delivered were broken. One spoon has the support lip that prevents the spoon from falling into the bowl, broken. The other spoon has a hairline crack in the middle. Please send me two replacements; otherwise, I will be returning it all.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Lee

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived as expected and it has great color and texture, but the end point of the handles have sharp edges so be careful of this when you order. When you purchase this product be sure to file these down on the end. I did and now they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Public Voice

customer_reviews.title: Ramen tastes better from this spoon
customer_reviews.text: Trying to replicate favorite restaurant ramen at home, utensils are important! Because these are notched, they can hook at top of deep bowl, or turn over and catch on small bowl. Coming out of dishwasher clean. In deciding between decorated without notch or plain color with notch, I am glad I selected these. Anticipate ordering more as gifts with bowls and spices for housewarming gifts.
customer_reviews.author: connie cn

customer_reviews.title: Great product, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: So much more convenient than a typical spoon. Even more convenient than a soup spoon, due to the fact that these will NOT fall in your bowl. Great product, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tom F

customer_reviews.title: Asian spoons where have you been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: This is the superior spoon, comes with a hook to keep from falling in to the bowl! I even ordered a set for my mom in Miami, she loves them too.
customer_reviews.author: Tewksbury customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for soup night!
customer_reviews.text: We order takeout hot and sour soup every Sunday night. Been wanting spoons like this for awhile. I especially like the hook that clips onto the soup bowl. Plus they're easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Great Spoons.. like the hook and notch also
customer_reviews.text: After getting some Pho and using these type of spoons I decided to once and all order some for soup at home. Glad I did. Really great for broth based soups...Also, in the restaurant they didn't have the hook and notch ... but also find that to be nice feature for keeping spoon from falling in bbowl.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Why was there trash with my package
customer_reviews.text: The product was good but when I received the package there was 4 items of trash with it the was a old bottle of coconut oil that was leaking and the top was black and moldy looking an old cellphone battery and 2 containers of glitter and a old nasty harmonica idk why that was in there but it wasn't very sanitary
customer_reviews.author: joshua mcclain

customer_reviews.title: Don’t fish your spoon out of your soup!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I couldn’t find any locally with the hook. I don’t want my spoon sliding down into my soup, and I’ve seen this type at restaurants. I used them twice on ramen, and they seem well-made and easy to rinse off. Shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Zell

customer_reviews.title: Great sppons
customer_reviews.text: I needed medium sized spoon for when I have noodle soup, which is often in the winter time. The notch is great in preventing the spoon from falling into the soup. No more fishing around for a lost spoon anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Pho spoons
customer_reviews.text: They are spoons. They work like every other spoon I've ever used. But they are deeper than American spoons. Which deliver more delicious broth to the mouth hole while enjoying a hot bowl of pho.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for soups and cream of wheat
customer_reviews.text: If I was smart I would have bought the bowls of the same color. I'm a bariatric patient so it will be a little bit before I need them but the spoons are great.
customer_reviews.author: Raschell

customer_reviews.title: Just like they use in restaurants
customer_reviews.text: These work great for soup, just like the ones typically seen in Japanese and Chinese restaurants. They seem pretty indestructible and hold up fine in the dishwasher too.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Rechlin

customer_reviews.title: not as expected
customer_reviews.text: These are plastic and I assumed they were ceramic. Not used for anything but kids digging in the ground....!!
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Riddle

customer_reviews.title: It’s not RED it’s not RED!! Oh yeah it’s not RED
customer_reviews.text: Advertised pictures are misleading. It’s more like a brick color. It’s not red like advertised pictures. What a waste of time. Due to COVID-19 I waited a month for this. Very disappointed it does not go well with my red and black ramen bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Kalvin

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: They're kind of large for me but I'm getting used to using them. They work well and the ridges that keep them from sinking into the bowl is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nebica Lynn

customer_reviews.title: difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: sturdy product, but difficult to use.. bowl part is so deep that I had to lean head back too far to get all of soup out of it. They would be ok for dry ingredients but not for drinking/eating. Sorry - I was looking forward to using, threw them away instead.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Just what I ordered. The color is a bit more brown then the red shown in the picture but the spoons themselves are exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: mike novak

customer_reviews.title: as expected
customer_reviews.text: This item fits its description and I had no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but one of them arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking spoon. Happy with the color. Only thing is one of them was already broken in the package. They need to be packaged better!?
customer_reviews.author: Queen of Cups

customer_reviews.title: Packaged poorly, dinged and DIRTY
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product is as expected, light plastic soup spoons. However, the spoons were packaged very poorly (thrown in a bag inside of a typical Amazon bubble mailer, no other case or protection) and arrived dinged a bit. I'm not surprised at all that others' had broken spoons. Also, my spoons has fingerprint marks all over them as well as a couple water-spot looking marks, as if these had been used in some way before. Gross.
customer_reviews.author: Josh T

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After arriving later than expected, I was highly disappointed at these spoons (I ordered 2 sets) The color was the most disappointing. (Very dull)..This is definitely not the same color.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: No more drowning spoons
customer_reviews.text: I first saw this nifty type of hooked soup spoon while dining at a neighborhood Vietnamese restaurant recently. Came home and sure enough, saw they are available on amazon at a reasonable price so I ordered them. These have an extra notch near the bowl of the spoon which the restaurant ones didn't have. I'm keeping two of them and giving the others to my dining companions as a surprise!
customer_reviews.author: JFin

customer_reviews.title: Unique design and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Unique design, distinctive color scheme. Great quality and perfect function. Guest loved it and the seller shipped super fast

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy these again
customer_reviews.text: Love these spoons for bowls of all sizes. They look as pictured and the stickers cane off without a problem, which isn’t the case with some products.

customer_reviews.text: Was shopping for spoons for pho... found them. Great design. But the red they look on the site is really more a burnt orange color in reality.

customer_reviews.title: Better than regular spoons.
customer_reviews.text: Already grew comfortably using these spoons and already had two just like these so I went ahead and got more and I already loved them they work just great.

customer_reviews.title: Color not as described!
customer_reviews.text: So just got these today. They seem sturdy which is great! However, they are NOT red as pictured! They are more of a burnt orange which I’m not happy with. Also, someone said they’re made in Japan, mine had a sticker made in China! Ugh.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for soup.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect soup spoons, love them. They just don't sit on any bowel.

customer_reviews.title: melamine soup spoons

customer_reviews.text: I bought the six pack of spoons. One of them was broken on arrival. No big deal for me, because I really don’t need more than two. They are not red and black as advertised. The black is black, but the red is more of a burnt sienna or a brick color. Regardless of that, they definitely are worth the money that I spent.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, will update on long term durability
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, will update on long term durability. However the SIZE is good, plently large for me since i hate standard US spood size for soup and such. The length is adequate, about 6-7 inches.

customer_reviews.title: They were delivered kinda dirty. Seems like they were in a shelf for ...

customer_reviews.text: Can hold more food than traditional spoons, however, you need to learn how to hold it at first.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I have only used them once and they seem fine.

customer_reviews.title: Does their job
customer_reviews.text: Durable and and easy to clean plastic. Ideal for family use, especially families with small children who still haven't completely mastered the hand dexterity required for a regular spoon. Bough these primarily for my daughter at 2 years to east soup with, and it has reduced the mess by a lot.

customer_reviews.title: Nice spoons
customer_reviews.text: Eating my noodle soup is so much more enjoyable now. The spoon rests nicely on the edge of my bowl. There really is no comparison between using a regular western spoon and one like this when you eat pho or other noodle soup. Also nice with soup dumplings.

customer_reviews.title: Works well and easy to clean and hold!

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!

customer_reviews.title: I am glad that i decided to get them
customer_reviews.text: I am glad that i decided to get them, but when i received them, one was broke, but i don't care i have always wanted them. Spoons are great.

product_meta.title: Happy Sales Melamine Soba, Rice Spoons, Chinese Won Ton Soup Spoon, Asian Red and Black, 6 Pack Notch & Hook Style
product_meta.description: Color:Notch&hookSet of 6 Red & Black Asian/Chinese style soup spoons. Used by many restaurants. Made of durable melamine that is dishwasher safe. These have the hook and notch to prevent slipping in the bowl. Measures 6.25 Inches in length and holds 1 fluid ounces. A must have for any restaurant or kitchen. UPC# 636173667292 by Happy Sales ONLY.
feature_bullets: 6 pieces Asian/Chinese melamine soup spoons with Notch & Hook to prevent slipping in the bowl
Commercial quality can be used in restaurants, food shops, catering halls, etc.
Compact and easy to use, Dishwasher Safe (low temp.)
